name: Unstable Nuclear Core Game
description:
This game was created in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare Game jam

Hey, I'm Ace. This is the first jam I've participated in and the first time sharing a game. I'm pretty new to game dev but I think I went beyond my expectations for this jam.

How to Play

You must keep the core stable while the cooling system is being repaired!

On the left you have the buttons pannel. When the pad flashes, click in the colors seen at the top (Like simon says).

In the middle you have two things. One is the code (on the top). Once you get a code you must type it back into the console.

You also have sliders. These will decrease over time. Make sure to drag them back up occasionally.

And finaly on the right you have the temperature. Hold down with your mouse on the handle to cool down the core.

Make sure you do not let the cores stability drop to zero. You can check it with the bar on the right wall.

Enjoy playing!
